Detailed Description

template<typename SDA, typename SCL>
class miosix::SoftwareI2C< SDA, SCL >

Software I2C class.

Parameters:
SDA SDA gpio pin. Pass a Gpio<P,N> class
SCL SCL gpio pin. Pass a Gpio<P,N> class
